column17:
In yellow colour this floral printed saree comes from the house of Strollay. Crafted from high quality georgette fabric this saree has laced borders with sequin detailing on it.

Wash & Care
Wash it with a mild detergent.
If washing in a machine set it on a delicate mode and low temperature cycle.
Wash dark colours separately and use iron at low temperature.
